description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa, Rhubarb, Walnut & Haloumi Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quinoa, Rhubarb, Walnut & Haloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the salad, combine the quinoa with leaves, celery, walnuts, cucumber, mint, and onion in a large bowl. Pour over vinegarette dressing. Add rhubarb and halloumi and toss gently to combine. Serve immediately.
